name: Frog Frog Flower
description:
A JUMP KING inspired platformer with multiple short levels.

I made this game with the help of my wife in the past few weeks when we had free time, it's a sweet but short game with a total of only 17 levels. We hope you enjoy it!

MUSIC FROM - https://opengameart.org/users/randommind

ART FROM - https://www.artstation.com/blackvilas

GAME GUIDE:

  • LEFT/RIGHT- Change Direction
  • SPACE - Hold to charge, release to jump
  • Escape - Pause/Settings menu
  • GOAL - Stomp the Flower!

NOTE: Gamepads are supported (only tested with PlayStation Controller! If any issues arise with other controllers, please contact me!)
